entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
